name: Ninja
description: Little game where i mainly wanted to focus on making something simple to grasp and on the lowest pixel density I've ever achieved for tile sizing, 8 by 8.
instructions:
Move around with <kbd>W</kbd> <kbd>A</kbd> <kbd>S</kbd> <kbd>D</kbd>, attack to the left, right, up and down using your <kbd>Arrow keys</kbd>.

Attacking will also gives you some accelleration towards the attack direction. You can attack only once while in mid-air.
